CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , a more stable copolymer with high performance can be obtained by using BDT as the core unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. Copolymer
2. High performance
3. BDT (assuming this is a specific type of core unit being referred to)

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. A property name is a word or phrase that refers to a characteristic or attribute of something. In this case, the property names refer to the properties of the copolymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Copolymer (this is a type of material)
2. High performance (this is a property of the copolymer)

These are the entities that clearly refer to material properties in the given paragraph. I have removed BDT because it is not clear from the context whether it is a material property or a specific type of core unit. If BDT is a material property, then it can be included in the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
